wf_workflow_version.name: New Donate Request V2.0
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Notification to the Assigned to volunteer

sys_variable_value.value:
Hi ${assigned_to},
A new donation task has been assigned to for delivery.
Cheers, DonateNow Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Notification to the Assigned to volunteer

sys_variable_value.value:
Thank you ${name} for spreading happiness yet again. We are eagerly waiting for your happiness to be delivered.
Thank you, DonateNow Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hi,
A new donation task has been assigned to Assignment group: ${assignment_group}.
Cheers, DonateNow Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear ${name},
Thank you for spreading happiness to our little world. Your contribution has gifted smile to several of ours.
Cheers, DonateNow Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

to.display_value: Notification to the Assigned to volunteer

from.display_value: Notification to the Assigned to volunteer
